summary: This document contains the results of due diligence research conducted on the 2007 Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust #3. The research was performed in compliance with AML standards, revealing no significant negative media or legal issues associated with the trust. It emphasizes the importance of escalating any findings related to politically exposed persons (PEPs) and the necessity of further searches as required.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is mentioned as the subject of the due diligence research regarding his insurance trust.

keyFacts: The document reports no negative media or legal issues found related to the 2007 Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust #3.
The due diligence research was conducted in accordance with AML compliance standards.
The research was performed by Slimya Parashar on June 15, 2017.
No information was found in various databases including court cases and public records.
The document emphasizes the need for escalation of findings related to politically exposed persons (PEPs).
